jd_parsed.raw: We are inviting motivated and analytical individuals to join us as ResearchAnalyst Fellows. The fellowship offers hands-on experience in research, reportwriting, and data analysis across development projects, CSR initiatives, NGOoperations, and public-private sector collaborations. Fellows will workclosely with senior researchers and project managers to support ongoingprojects and gain exposure to applied research in social development and publichealth sectors.Key Responsibilities• Conduct desk research and literature reviews on development, CSR,NGO, and public sector topics.• Collect, clean, and analyze quantitative and qualitative data using MSExcel, Word, and other tools.• Prepare structured reports, presentations, and project documentation forinternal and external stakeholders.• Assist in monitoring and evaluation of projects, including trackingprogress and reporting insights.
responsibilities: Fellows will workclosely with senior researchers and project managers to support ongoingprojects and gain exposure to applied research in social development and publichealth sectors.
